ToeThreadReport (slightly edited to just show times):

Check Thread #5 and #6, active for + 6m and + 3m.  These times don't
seem to be cumulative for the duration of the run.  Also using the
count-per-domain feature with a limit of 500 pages per domain.  Seems
like the majority of threads are spending the majority of their time
in LinkScoper?
